titleStmt.title: Babylon is fallen, or, A Prophesie that had lain hid above two thousand years foreshewing the rising, continuance, and fall of the empire and supremacie of Rome, with all matters of moment that were to come to passe during the reigne of the emperours and popes ...
titleStmt.author: T. L.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
